valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 4 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 5 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low 50 miles south of Iceland 989 losing its identity

Southwest 4 or 5 becoming variable 2 to 4.

Showers, perhaps thundery.

Good, occasionally poor.
